Sentencas: Electrical conductivity and structural behavior in Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composite cathodes for intermediate temperature solid-oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) have been investigated.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites

Sentencas: The ionically conducting component (BiYWO) was selected as it not only exhibits high oxide ion conductivity at intermediate temperatures, but also shows good long-term stability.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites

Sentencas: The LSM component is a well-known electronic conductor, commonly used for SOFC cathodes and also shows high interfacial polarization effects.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites

Sentencas: Both composite components exhibit similar thermal expansion coefficients.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites

Sentencas: Composites of different molar ratios of components were prepared by sintering the components together at 850 degrees C. Electrical behavior was studied by a.c. impedance spectroscopy and transference number measurements were used to determine the ionic and electronic contributions to total conductivity.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites

Sentencas: Percolation type behavior was observed for total conductivity and the percolation threshold value was determined to be in the bismuth rich region of the compositional range, due to the significant difference in the grain sizes of the two components.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites

Sentencas: Ionic and electronic components of the total conductivity at, above and below the percolation threshold are discussed.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites

Sentencas: Stability measurements on a composition close to the percolation threshold show some degree of conductivity decay on prolonged annealing at 650 degrees C, which is partly recoverable on heating to higher temperatures.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Bi3Y0.9W0.1O6.15-La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (BiYWO-LSM) composites
